content: When I was a kid, I thought that if I died the world would just disappear. What a childish delusion! I just couldn't accept that the world could continue to exist without me.
translations: ita:Quando ero un ragazzino, pensavo che se fossi morto il mondo sarebbe solo scomparso. Che delusione infantile! Sempliceme
